function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Spread of sars-cov-2 through the air at a distance of 2m or more in a confined and crowded environment.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Control of infectious aerosols by ventilation, filtration, and uv germicidal irradiation.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Propagation of sars-cov-2 aerosols in the built environment","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of short-range transmission of small droplets","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Suspension of aerosols up to 10 μm in diameter indoors","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation leading to high concentration of infectious aerosols in the air","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor indoor air mixing leading to non-uniform concentration of bioaerosols","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncontrolled quantum generation rate of infectious aerosols","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low ventilation rate in office buildings","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate air filtration in hvac systems","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of individual hvac systems with lower ventilation rates","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate implementation of uvgi systems","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate monitoring of uvgi system performance","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Indoor transmission of contagious diseases such as influenza a and sars-cov-2","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Close contact in indoor environments leading to infectious clusters","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"General buildings in japan lack a ventilation standard for infection control, leading to poor ventilation and crowded spaces.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Proposed factors such as ’closed spaces with poor ventilation,’ ’crowded spaces with many people,’ and ’close contact’ contribute to the formation of covid-19 clusters.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate maintenance of air-conditioning and ventilation systems in specific buildings can lead to poor ventilation, increasing the risk of covid-19 transmission.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation rates may result in the spread of contagious diseases like tuberculosis, measles, and sars-cov-2 within built environments.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor indoor environment with insufficient cooling and dehumidification","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of specific standard values for ventilation rates","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 complicating heatstroke prevention","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation leading to increased risk of covid-19 spread","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Air conditioners potentially contributing to the spread of covid-19","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Prevention of heatstroke with infection control measures","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 through air conditioning systems in buildings without proper filters","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate airflow in poorly ventilated rooms","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential negative impact of natural ventilation on air balance in accordance with building laws","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unclear infection mechanism in indoor environments","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of specific ventilation guidelines","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sars-cov-2 can persist on fomite surfaces for 3-7 days in indoor environments, leading to potential transmission of the virus.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Close-contact aerosol transmission of sars-cov-2 is likely in confined, crowded, and poorly ventilated indoor environments, increasing the risk of contagion.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate preventive measures in indoor environments can lead to exposure to the virus through close contact, respiratory droplets, and fomite transmission.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor ventilation in closed spaces","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Crowded spaces with many people","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate control of air-conditioning and ventilation systems","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 in indoor environments","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 through air and environmental compartments such as water, soils, and wastewater","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 in sewage waters","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Complicated sample handling in the laboratory for pcr testing","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Effectiveness of current disinfection technologies on treating the virus","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Presence of viruses in sewage and wastewater","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Survival of viruses in water and sewage","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fecal transmission routes and aerosol formation during wastewater treatment","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Possible airborne transmission of covid-19 in patient rooms","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shortage of supply chain for critical ppe","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on disinfection using potentially unsafe treatments for covid-19","category":"Land Use","confidence":"Medium"}]}
